"I'm coming"said the femme and she came in the base


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus Prime(to Nightlight, over comm): Trouble soon. Could you 
come fiind me? I'd like it if you stayed close to me during what's 
coming.
> 
> Rodimus then switches his comm channel to all Maximals.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Maximals, this is Commander Rodimus Prime. I have 
allied us with the forces of Tyrael and Cygnar. We expect the 
Predacons to attack their base. Both those factions will defend that 
base as we strike the nearly empty Predacon base. However this is all 
dependable on the Predacons. They could attack us first. If so, then 
Tyrael and Cygnar's forces will back us up here. We will stand and 
fight. I want everyone ready immedietly. We are on red alert!
> 
> Alarms sound through the base signaling for battle readyness. The 
base's defense and weapon systems come online.
> 
> 
> : : Kup : :
> 
> Kup stands up, drawing his rifle from subspace.
> 
> Kup: Well welcome to the Neo Beast Wars, Magnus.
